Three Panel Soul http://threepanelsoul.com Just another WordPress weblog Mon, 24 Dec 2012 10:52:19 +0000 en hourly 1 http://wordpress.org/?v=3.0.4 Doodle: On our 4th Year http://threepanelsoul.com/2012/12/24/doodle-on-our-4th-year-2/ http://threepanelsoul.com/2012/12/24/doodle-on-our-4th-year-2/#comments Mon, 24 Dec 2012 10:52:19 +0000 Ian http://threepanelsoul.com/?p=1663 Another anniversary, another portrait for my wife. This year’s topic; Guild Wars 2. We shared a good amount of time playing that together, and since I already did a Spiral Knights one, it seemed like the right call… Otherwise it would have been two variants of Shepard looking all pissy.

Here we have my Asura elementalist and her Human engineer. We get killed alot…

Years of being a game’s artist has left me thinking completely in T-poses and the like… I fear I’ll never get my legs back for drawing dynamic poses again. As a result, these two serious duders, are rather rigid.

I guess I should save my worry for if I ever can look at my work and see no flaws.

To see a larger res version check over here.
